biotools.summary: A package of user-friendly terminal/command-line and interactive applications developed in Perl, to enable the high-throughput analyses of multiple genes/datasets in PAML (codeml). LMAP was designed for the workstation multi-core environment and enables all the codeml codon substitutions models: site models, branch models, branch-site models and clade models.

bioschemas.name: LMAP
